snippet: LeBron James scored 24 points to pass Dominique Wilkins, and the Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Nets, 107-87.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Brooklyn Nets, 107-87; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 24 points to pass Dominique Wilkins, and the Cleveland Cavaliers beat the Nets, 107-87.

headline.main: LeBron James Moves Up Scoring List as Cavs Beat Nets
headline.print_headline: LeBron James Moves Up Scoring List as Cavs Beat Nets
